channel.title: Need professional *java* help now! huge server error!
channel.description:
ok so heres the problem. if i leave my server running for mover then a few hours, i get HUNDREADS of files in my server with the text below in it, plus theres a program in taskmanager called java.exe opened hundreads of times also. anuone have iny idea what this is? i need some help fast because i have a new server and i dont need to loose any more members because of downtime. error file is below.
# # An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment: # # java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: requested 64000 bytes for GrET in C:\BUILD_AREA\jdk6_06\hotspot\src\share\vm\utilities\growableArray.cpp. Out of swap space? # # Internal Error (allocation.inline.hpp:42), pid=900, tid=3228 # Error: GrET in C:\BUILD_AREA\jdk6_06\hotspot\src\share\vm\utilities\growableArray.cpp # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (10.0-b22 mixed mode windows-x86) # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
--------------- T H R E A D ---------------
Current thread (0x48a3fc00): VMThread [stack: 0x48ad0000,0x48b20000] [id=3228]
Stack: [0x48ad0000,0x48b20000] [error occurred during error reporting (printing stack bounds), id 0x80000001]
VM_Operation (0x0090fbd4): GenCollectFull, mode: safepoint, requested by thread 0x00295400
--------------- P R O C E S S ---------------

Other Threads: =>0x48a3fc00 VMThread [stack: 0x48ad0000,0x48b20000] [id=3228] 0x48a67c00 WatcherThread [stack: 0x48d00000,0x48d50000] [id=4012]
VM state:at safepoint (normal execution)
VM Mutex/Monitor currently owned by a thread: ([mutex/lock_event]) [0x00294b88/0x00000714] Threads_lock - owner thread: 0x48a3fc00 [0x00294d28/0x000006d4] Heap_lock - owner thread: 0x00295400
Heap def new generation total 2432K, used 0K [0x02990000, 0x02c30000, 0x07850000) eden space 2176K, 0% used [0x02990000, 0x02990000, 0x02bb0000) from space 256K, 0% used [0x02bb0000, 0x02bb0000, 0x02bf0000) to space 256K, 0% used [0x02bf0000, 0x02bf0000, 0x02c30000) tenured generation total 31552K, used 18930K [0x07850000, 0x09720000, 0x42990000) the space 31552K, 59% used [0x07850000, 0x08acc8a0, 0x08acca00, 0x09720000) compacting perm gen total 12288K, used 2135K [0x42990000, 0x43590000, 0x46990000) the space 12288K, 17% used [0x42990000, 0x42ba5fa8, 0x42ba6000, 0x43590000) No shared spaces configured.

item.title: Need professional *java* help now! huge server error!
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

ok so heres the problem. if i leave my server running for mover then a few hours, i get HUNDREADS of files in my server with the text below in it, plus theres a program in taskmanager called java.exe opened hundreads of times also. anuone have iny idea what this is? i need some help fast because i have a new server and i dont need to loose any more members because of downtime. error file is below.
